pages.title: Invisible to You
pages.text: While Riding a Chocobo, the chocobo will not get in your field of view.$(br)-aka, The Chocobo will not render locally for you while you're mounted & in first person view

pages.title: Mounted Movement
pages.text: Chocobos will not 'Move' on their own while Mounted, but will Melee attack a target in melee range that you are attacking, or has attacked you or it.$(br)-Exception being other Chocobos you hit or hit you.  It maybe possible to get one to attack another, but given chocobos do not have ranged attacks... don't count on it.

pages.title: Side by Side
pages.text: The Chocobo will focus targets above following you. The Chocobo will Target those you hit & hit you, with some exceptions.

pages.title: Targeting Refused
pages.text: Chocobos Will refuse to attack the following$(br)-Chocobos$(br)-Ender Dragons$(br)-Phantoms$(br)-Fishes[Puffer fish/Tropical Fish/etc]$(br)-Squid/GlowSquid$(br)-Bats$(br)-Dolphins$(br)-Guardians/Elder Guardians$(br)-Striders$(br)-Ghasts$(br)-Skeleton Horses

pages.title: Multi-Player Friendly
pages.text: Chocobos Respect & honor The Owners team.$(br)-Players on the same team will not be targeted by each others chocobo.$(br)-- Included basic teams will be enough to enable to play with each other without accidents being turned deadly.

pages.title: Chocobo Pack Attack
pages.text: Chocobos will join on the attack with most any targets With some exception.
